author: Anonymous Beaker
title: Dr Racket problem
question:
I closed my Dr. Racket window, and relaunched it to find the window that shows our tests passing like this:
It used to be on bottom but now its on the side, does anyone know how to fix this and bring it back to the bottom?
student_answer:
Nvm I figured it out...
If anyone else is also having this problem just press: ctrl + shift + L
